text: Edward Meyer or Ed Meyer is the name of: *Edward C. Meyer (1928–2020), former U.S. Army Chief of Staff *J. Edward Meyer (born 1935), former New York assembly member, and Connecticut state senator *Ed Meyer (American football) (1936–2014), former American football player *Ted Meyer (1907–1981), rugby league footballer of the 1930s for New Zealand, and Northland
title: Edward Meyer
